Package org.apache.spark.util.collection.unsafe.sort

Class UnsafeSortDataFormat

java.lang.Object
org.apache.spark.util.collection.SortDataFormat<RecordPointerAndKeyPrefix,org.apache.spark.unsafe.array.LongArray>
org.apache.spark.util.collection.unsafe.sort.UnsafeSortDataFormat
public final class UnsafeSortDataFormat extends org.apache.spark.util.collection.SortDataFormat<RecordPointerAndKeyPrefix,org.apache.spark.unsafe.array.LongArray>
Supports sorting an array of (record pointer, key prefix) pairs. Used in UnsafeInMemorySorter.

Within each long[] buffer, position 2 * i holds a pointer to the record at index i, while position 2 * i + 1 in the array holds an 8-byte key prefix.
